title: Crab and avocado salad
ingredients: ['3 tbsp mayonnaise', '1 tsp finely grated lime zest', '1 1/2 tbsp lime juice', '170g can white crab meat, drained', '2 avocados', '1 tbsp olive oil', 'pinch of caster sugar', '175g cherry tomatoes, halved', "140g mixed salad leaves, such as fris√©e, lamb's lettuce, mizuna and rocket", '1/2 medium cucumber, halved and thinly sliced', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'fine strips of lime zest to garnish']
